benchmarkQueries.description: Comprehensive benchmark queries for 100-node canvas evaluation

categories.name: Node Retrieval
categories.description: Direct node lookup and single-entity queries

queries.query: What customer requests are related to dark mode?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-1 (text: 'User requests dark mode')

queries.query: Which feature handles PDF export?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-3 (text: 'PDF Export')

queries.query: What technology component manages authentication?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-16 (text: 'Auth Service')

queries.query: Which revenue stream is related to Enterprise SSO?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns revenue-16 (text: 'Enterprise SSO Plan')

queries.query: Find the customer requesting offline mode support
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-7 (text: 'Offline mode support')

queries.query: What is the Real-time Collaboration feature?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-4

queries.query: Which tech component is the WebSocket Server?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-4

queries.query: Find the Template Marketplace revenue stream
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns revenue-10

queries.query: Who requested keyboard shortcuts?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-9

queries.query: What feature provides smart notifications?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-8

queries.query: Which customer wants SSO authentication?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-16

queries.query: Find the Analytics Suite feature
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-19

queries.query: What technology handles search indexing?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-5 (text: 'Search Index')

queries.query: Which customer needs collaborative editing?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-4

queries.query: Find the Mobile Optimization feature
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-2

queries.query: What is the CDN Integration component?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-14

queries.query: Which revenue stream represents the Team Plan?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns revenue-4

queries.query: Who wants better notifications?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-8

queries.query: Find the i18n Framework component
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-22

queries.query: What feature handles version control?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-11

queries.query: Which customer requested webhooks support?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-21

queries.query: Find the Batch Processing feature
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-17

queries.query: What technology manages the queue system?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-17 (text: 'Queue System')

queries.query: Which customer wants custom branding?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-15

queries.query: Find the ARIA Compliance feature
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-23

queries.query: What is the Storage Service component?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-25

queries.query: Which revenue stream is the Developer Plan?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns revenue-19

queries.query: Who requested multi-language support?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns customer-22

queries.query: Find the Hotkeys System feature
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns feature-9

queries.query: What technology provides the Event Bus?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-21

categories.name: Edge/Relationship Queries
categories.description: Direct edge and single-hop relationship queries

queries.query: Does customer-1 request feature-1?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms edge exists with label 'feature_request'

queries.query: Does tech-4 implement feature-4?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms edge exists with label 'implements'

queries.query: Does feature-1 generate revenue-1?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms edge exists with label 'generates_revenue'

queries.query: Does tech-1 block tech-6?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms edge exists with label 'blocks'

queries.query: List all features that customer-2 requested
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both feature-2 and feature-6

queries.query: What technologies implement feature-16?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-16 (Auth Service)

queries.query: Which revenue streams does feature-1 generate?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both revenue-1 and revenue-15

queries.query: What does tech-2 block?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-14 (CDN Integration)

queries.query: Which features are requested by customer-5?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both feature-5 and feature-17

queries.query: Does feature-4 relate to feature-12?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms edge exists with label 'related_to'

queries.query: What blocks tech-16?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both tech-4 and tech-12

queries.query: Which customers request feature-3?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both customer-3 and customer-28

queries.query: Does tech-5 implement feature-5?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms implements relationship

queries.query: Which features generate revenue-15?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns all three features

queries.query: What does customer-14 request?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both features

queries.query: Is tech-11 related to tech-12?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms related_to relationship

queries.query: Which features does customer-1 request?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both feature-1 and feature-23

queries.query: Does tech-16 block tech-4?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms blocks relationship

queries.query: What revenue does feature-20 generate?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns revenue-19

queries.query: Which features request from customer-10?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both features

queries.query: Is customer-3 related to customer-28?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms related_to relationship

queries.query: What does tech-7 block?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns tech-24

queries.query: Which revenue streams relate to revenue-15?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns all four revenue streams

queries.query: Does feature-5 relate to feature-17?
queries.evaluation: Correct if confirms related_to relationship

queries.query: What features does customer-19 request?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns both features

queries.query: Trace the path from customer-1 to revenue-1
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path customer-1 → feature-1 → revenue-1

queries.query: How does customer-16 connect to revenue-16?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path customer-16 → feature-16 → revenue-16

queries.query: What is the dependency chain from tech-3 through tech-2 to tech-14?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds blocking chain tech-3 → tech-2 → tech-14

queries.query: Find the path from customer-4 to revenue-4 through features
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path customer-4 → feature-4 → revenue-4

queries.query: How does tech-1 ultimately affect feature-6?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path tech-1 → tech-6 → feature-6

queries.query: Trace blocking dependencies from tech-5 to tech-20
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path tech-5 → tech-19 → tech-20

queries.query: What connects customer-7 to revenue-7?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path customer-7 → feature-7 → revenue-7

queries.query: Find the relationship chain from customer-3 to customer-28 to feature-3
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path customer-3 → customer-28 → feature-3

queries.query: How does tech-16 connect to feature-16 through blocking and implementing?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds direct implements relationship

queries.query: Trace the path from customer-1 to revenue-15 via feature-1
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path customer-1 → feature-1 → revenue-15

queries.query: What is the blocking chain from tech-7 to tech-7?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds circular dependency tech-7 → tech-24 → tech-7

queries.query: How do customer-5's requests lead to revenue-5?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds at least one valid path to revenue-5

queries.query: Find the connection from tech-1 to tech-1 (circular dependency)
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds circular path tech-1 → tech-15 → tech-1

queries.query: Trace customer-21's impact on revenue-19
queries.evaluation: Correct if identifies no direct path to revenue-19, but finds path to revenue-20

queries.query: What is the shortest path from customer-10 to revenue-10?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds direct 2-hop path

queries.query: How does tech-24 relate back to tech-7?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds blocking relationship tech-24 → tech-7

queries.query: Find paths from customer-14 to any revenue stream
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds both valid paths to revenue streams

queries.query: Trace the blocking chain from tech-21 to tech-25
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path tech-21 → tech-18 → tech-25

queries.query: How does customer-29 connect to revenue-4?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds path customer-29 → feature-4 → revenue-4

queries.query: Find all 3-hop paths from customer-1 to any revenue
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds all three paths

queries.query: How many features does customer-1 request?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 2

queries.query: Count all revenue streams generated by feature-1
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 2

queries.query: How many technologies block tech-16?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 5 (includes tech-4, tech-12 direct blocks, plus others)

queries.query: How many customers request feature-4?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 3

queries.query: Count all features that generate revenue-5
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 4

queries.query: How many features are related to other features?
queries.note: Count of unique features involved in related_to edges between features
queries.evaluation: Correct if counts all unique features with related_to edges (edges 125-135)

queries.query: What is the total number of blocking relationships between technologies?
queries.note: Count of edges 41-70 (blocks relationships)
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 30

queries.query: How many customers request exactly 2 features?
queries.evaluation: Correct if identifies customers with exactly 2 outgoing feature_request edges

queries.query: Count features that generate multiple revenue streams
queries.evaluation: Correct if identifies features with 2+ generates_revenue edges

queries.query: How many technologies implement features?
queries.note: All 25 tech components implement exactly one feature
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 25

queries.query: What percentage of features generate revenue?
queries.note: All 25 features have at least one generates_revenue edge
queries.evaluation: Correct if calculates 25/25 = 100%

queries.query: Count all nodes of type ellipse (features)
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 25 based on type='ellipse'

queries.query: How many technologies does tech-21 block?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 1

queries.query: Count total number of relationships in the canvas
queries.note: Total edges in the canvas
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 150

queries.query: How many revenue streams relate to revenue-15?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns count of 4

categories.name: Filtering/Intersection
categories.description: Complex filtering and set intersection queries

queries.query: Find customers who request both mobile and performance features
queries.note: customer-2 requests feature-2 (Mobile Optimization) and feature-6; customer-14 requests feature-14 (Performance Boost) and feature-2
queries.evaluation: Correct if identifies customers with requests to both categories

queries.query: Which features are requested by multiple customers AND generate multiple revenue streams?
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds intersection of multi-request features and multi-revenue features

queries.query: Find technologies that both block other tech AND are blocked by other tech
queries.evaluation: Correct if identifies techs with both incoming and outgoing blocks edges

queries.query: List features related to both other features AND revenue streams
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds features with related_to edges to other features AND generates_revenue edges

queries.query: Which customers request features that are implemented by technologies blocking tech-16?
queries.note: tech-4 and tech-12 block tech-16; they implement feature-4 and feature-12
queries.evaluation: Correct if traces path: customer → feature → tech → blocks → tech-16

queries.query: Find all purple-colored nodes (revenue streams) connected to features requested by customer-1
queries.evaluation: Correct if filters by backgroundColor='#e599f7' and traces from customer-1

queries.query: Which features generate revenue AND are related to feature-15?
queries.note: feature-1 and feature-16 have related_to edges to feature-15
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds features with both generates_revenue and related_to feature-15

queries.query: List customers who request features that share the same implementing technology

groundTruth.note: Each tech implements only one feature, so need to find customers requesting features from same tech

queries.evaluation: Since each tech implements exactly one feature, result should be empty or identify shared feature requests

queries.query: Find diamond-shaped nodes (technologies) that implement features related to feature-1
queries.note: feature-15 is related to feature-1; tech-15 implements feature-15
queries.evaluation: Correct if filters by type='diamond' and traces relationships

queries.query: Which customers are related to other customers AND request features generating Enterprise Plan revenue?
queries.note: These customers have related_to edges and their requested features eventually generate revenue-15
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds intersection of related customers and those requesting features → revenue-15

queries.query: Find features that are NOT requested by customer-1 but ARE related to features customer-1 requests
queries.note: customer-1 requests feature-1 and feature-23; feature-1 relates to feature-15, feature-16 relates to feature-15
queries.evaluation: Correct if excludes customer-1's direct requests but includes related features

queries.query: Which technologies block each other in a circular dependency?
queries.evaluation: Correct if identifies circular blocking relationships

queries.query: Find customers requesting features implemented by technologies in the Event Bus dependency chain
queries.note: tech-21 (Event Bus) is involved in multiple dependencies
queries.evaluation: Correct if traces from tech-21 → implements → feature → requested_by → customer

queries.query: List all features that generate revenue-5 AND are related to other features
queries.note: feature-18 generates revenue-5 but has no related_to edges with other features
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds intersection of revenue-5 generators and features with related_to edges

queries.query: Which revenue streams are generated by features requested by customers related to customer-4?
queries.note: customer-4 is related to customer-29 via edge-122; customer-29 requests feature-4
queries.evaluation: Correct if traces: customer-4 → related_to → customer → requests → feature → generates → revenue

categories.name: Attribute Queries
categories.description: Queries based on node properties and attributes

queries.query: Find all nodes with blue background color
queries.note: 30 customer nodes with backgroundColor='#a5d8ff'
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns all 30 customer nodes

queries.query: List all ellipse-shaped nodes
queries.note: 25 feature nodes with type='ellipse'
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns all 25 feature nodes

queries.query: Find nodes with orange stroke color
queries.note: 25 tech nodes with strokeColor='#e67700'
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns all 25 tech nodes

queries.query: Which nodes are diamond-shaped?
queries.note: 25 tech nodes with type='diamond'
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns all 25 tech nodes

queries.query: Find all nodes with purple background
queries.note: 20 revenue nodes with backgroundColor='#e599f7'
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns all 20 revenue nodes

queries.query: List nodes containing 'SSO' in their text
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds all three nodes with SSO-related text

queries.query: Find all nodes with text containing 'API'
queries.note: API documentation, Developer API, Slack API Client, REST Framework, Screen Reader API
queries.evaluation: Correct if finds all nodes mentioning API

queries.query: Which nodes have strokeWidth of 2?
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns all nodes (they all have strokeWidth=2)

queries.query: Find nodes with text containing 'mobile' (case insensitive)
queries.note: Performance issues on mobile, Better mobile UI, Mobile Optimization, Mobile App Sales, Mobile Subscriptions
queries.evaluation: Correct if performs case-insensitive search

queries.query: List all rectangular nodes with green stroke color
queries.note: Rectangle nodes are customers (blue) and revenue (purple); none have green stroke
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns empty set

categories.name: Negative Queries (Hallucination Detection)
categories.description: Queries testing for non-existent relationships and entities

queries.query: Does Notification Service depend on Blockchain Module?
queries.note: No Blockchain Module exists in canvas
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns NO or indicates no such relationship exists

queries.query: List customers who requested quantum computing features
queries.note: No quantum computing features exist
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns empty set (no hallucinations)

queries.query: Does feature-1 implement tech-1?
queries.note: Relationship is backwards; tech-1 implements feature-1
queries.evaluation: Correct if rejects (only implements edges go tech → feature)

queries.query: Which features does revenue-5 request?
queries.note: Revenue streams don't request features; relationship is backwards
queries.evaluation: Correct if rejects or returns empty (no feature_request edges from revenue)

queries.query: Find the AI/ML features in the system
queries.note: No AI or ML features exist in canvas
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns empty set

queries.query: Does customer-1 directly generate revenue-1?
queries.note: No direct edge; must go through feature-1
queries.evaluation: Correct if indicates no direct relationship

queries.query: List all microservices in the architecture
queries.note: No nodes explicitly labeled as 'microservices'
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns empty or only returns services if interpreting tech nodes as services

queries.query: Which customers requested cryptocurrency payment support?
queries.note: No cryptocurrency-related nodes exist
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns empty set

queries.query: Does tech-5 generate revenue-5?
queries.note: No direct edge; tech implements features which generate revenue
queries.evaluation: Correct if indicates no direct relationship

queries.query: Find features that block technologies
queries.note: Only tech blocks tech; features don't block anything
queries.evaluation: Correct if returns empty set (no blocks edges from features)
